channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Update Structure Fire - FIRE OUT 07/18/2023 INC#0584

item.description: Update Structure Fire - FIRE OUT; INC#0584; 10:32AM; 15800 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q7DUwp; Van Nuys; Firefighters located and confirmed a fire out - there was a fully involved swamp cooler on the roof which employees extinguished. The fire did not extend into the structure and there are no injuries reported. One task force will handle, all other resources are released. No further details.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E103 E273 E275 E290 E81 EM12 RA90 T73 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0584; 10:16AM; 15800 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44M8Je0; Van Nuys; Very large, one story commercial building (DBA Anheuser-Busch) with smoke showing. Two additional task forces requested. Preliminary, unconfirmed reports state possible 'swamp cooler' fire on the roof. Firefighters are in the offensive mode working to locate the fire.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E103 E290 E81 RA90 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1732; 09:31PM; 8330 N Melvin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/43wWSj0; Northridge; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes. The property owner confirmed the house was used for storage only and no one was inside. The fire was contained to the unit of origin and prevented from extending to the surrounding trees/vegetation and structures. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E103 E104 E107 E273 E73 RA104 T73; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1732; 09:25PM; 8330 N Melvin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/43wWSj0; Northridge; Firefighters are in the defensive mode. The building is a detached, single family home (approx 1400sq ft) at the back of a large property with excessive storage and several different structures. Firefighters immediately knocked down the flames putting the exposures at risk and are working to contain the fire and extinguish with no extension. ; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E73 RA104 T73; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1732; 09:10PM; 8330 N Melvin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44Qk3FM; Reseda; One story, single family dwelling well involved in fire with multiple other buildings exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E273 RA104 T73; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1589; 07:30PM; 6800 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OgGMWk; Van Nuys; Two car collision which impacted a one story restaurant. There are two patients from the vehicles only (approx 40yo male and 50yo female) being transported with non-life threatening injuries. The building sustained minimal damage. Further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3925 ; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E288 E81 E90 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA90 T39 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1001; 02:06PM; 4215 W Mont Clair St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44LDwYr; Jefferson Park; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews prevented the fire from extending to any other apartments, containing it to the unit of origin. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E229 E34 E68 RA26 T29; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1001; 01:54PM; 4215 W Mont Clair St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44LDwYr; Jefferson Park; Three story, center hall apartment building with fire in one unit on the first floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E229 E34 E68 RA26 T29; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#0906; 02:03PM; 2562 W El Rosa Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NTCD9s; Glassell Park; Firefighters located the vehicle which went down the hillside approximately 200' and came to rest (in a stable position) in the backyard of a home. The patient is not trapped and is alert/conscious at this time. Firefighter/paramedics will assess the patient for any required treatment/transport. There is no damage to the structure. One task force and rescue ambulance will handle. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2190.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC2 BC5 E203 E250 E3 E55 EM11 H1 H7 HA1 HA7 HR3 RA3 RA55 RA850 RH114 T3 T50 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0750; 12:39PM; 1209 W 56th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DgKcC0; Vermont-Slauson; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters conducted vertical ventilation and coordinated hand lines working from above and below the attic while additional units performed salvage operations to protect the belongings in the home. Their actions contained the fire to the attic, preventing it from spreading down into the living space. There were no other structures exposed or damaged. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E233 E266 E57 E66 RA266 RA866 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
